text: Cauliflower is one of several vegetables in the species Brassica oleracea, in the family Brassicaceae. Cauliflower is a variety of cabbage, whose white flower head is eaten. Cauliflower is very nutritious, and may be eaten cooked, raw or pickled. It is a popular vegetable in Poland where it is eaten in a soup with cream or fried with bread crumbs. ==Colors of Cauliflower == * White * Orange * Purple * Green ==How Is Eaten== * Raw * salad * Pickled * Fried * Soup * Cooked with tomato sauce ==Photos== == References == Category:Vegetables Category:Brassica oleracea
title: Cauliflower
